content: this blanket comes together in sections making it the kind of project that you can take with you while on the go worked flat and in the round this crochet throw is constructed of 3 motif panels plus a striped section that goes between each panel red heart super saver ombre 10 oz/283 g 482 yds/440 m deep teal 3985 4 balls size u s h/8 5 mm crochet hook gauge 13 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 / 10 cm
